title.rendered: West Indies vs New Zealand 1st T20I: Pitch Report of Sabina Park, Jamaica

content.rendered:
Only three T20Is have been played at the Sabina Park in Jamaica. Barring the West Indies vs India game in 2017, the other two games were low-scoring. The team batting second has won 2 matches whereas at the venue whereas team batting first have won 1 match.

Out of 36 wickets to fall, only 8 have belonged to the spinners.

Also Read:

Ireland vs Afghanistan Fantasy Cricket Tips

West Indies vs New Zealand 1st T20I Fantasy Team, Playing XIs & Top Picks

T20I Records at the Sabina Park:

Highest total: 194/1 by West Indies against India on 9th July 2017

Lowest total: 85/8 by Ireland vs West Indies

Total matches: 3 

Batting first won: 2 

Batting second won: 1

Average first inning score: 134

Highest individual score: 125 by Evin Lewis against India on 9th July 2017

Best bowling figures: 4/11 by Alex Cusack against West Indies on 21 February  2014

All T20I Match Results at the Sabina Park:

Match 1: West Indies vs Ireland

Date: 19th February 2014 

Winner: Ireland

Margin: 6 wickets

Match 2: West Indies vs Ireland

Date: 21st February 2014 

Winner: West Indies

Margin: 11 runs

Match 3: West Indies vs India

Date:  9th July 2017

Winner: West Indies

Margin: 9 wickets
